dmca.title: PVA Enterprises Corp. Claims 9Corp Site Infringes
dmca.body:
I am requesting that you remove any and all information on Google 
about a firm called 9Corp and Vortex Technologies, Inc. (distributor 
for 9Corp).

If one goes on the Google website and types in "Ground Transient" 
information comes up on both 9Corp and Vortex Technologies, Inc.

9Corp is violating our US patent number 6,385,029. They are also 
violating our copy written material both in print and off our 
website... www.pvacorp.com

9Corp is a shell corporation owned by a firm called Perlio 
Technologies, LLC, [private], St. Charles, IL. Their 
website is... www.perilo.com

PVA Enterprises Corporation has a NDA signed with Perlio Technologies 
which states they can not compete, use any of our copy written 
material, etc. I am including a copy of the NDA that was signed by 
Perilo Technologies and PVA. They Perlio and their shell company 
9Corp have no right to use any of our copy written and patented 
information. The same is true for Vortex Technologies which also 
comes up on the Google search engine when types in "Ground 
Transients."

Perlio Technologies and Vortex have repeatedly ignored our requests 
and are now falsely listing their shell company 9Corp on Google and 
other search engine websites as being the owner of PVA's patented 
technology.

They are even using copy written material both in printed form and 
off our website that states they received the EC&M 2003 Product of 
the year award. This to is false information and the award belongs to 
our firm PVA Enterprises Corporation.

I am requesting the following URL's to be taken off the Google website
